name: Dire Wolf
description: A Dire Wolf emerges from the forest and bares it's fangs at you.
preAttackDescription: The Dire Wolf howls calling for reinforcements. Your surrounded.

name: Zombie
description: A Zombie groans from behind you. Protect your brain!
preAttackDescription: The Zombie shuffles closer to you.
specialAttackDescription: The Zombie takes a bite out of you restoring it's health.

name: Dragon
description: A Dragon flies overhead. It roars a challenge and lands before you.
preAttackDescription: The Dragon's belly begins to glow. Prepare yourself.
specialAttackDescription: The Dragon spews forth fire at you.
